00022 namespace ipl {

00024 using std::lower_bound;

00030 CSparseHoughSpace3D::CSparseHoughSpace3D()
00031 {
00032 }

00034 
00035 CSparseHoughSpace3D::CSparseHoughSpace3D(int ImageWidth, int ImageHeight)
00036 {
00037         m_circleQuante = this->ComputeQuantization(ImageWidth, ImageHeight);
00038         CArray2D<str_list<CPoint2D<int> > >::Alloc(m_circleQuante.GetX(), m_circleQuante.GetY());
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 CSparseHoughSpace3D::~CSparseHoughSpace3D()
00043 {
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00048 // Public methods
00050 
00051 
00052 bool CSparseHoughSpace3D::Inc(const CPoint3D<int>& Position)
00053 {
00054         int c1, c2, c3;
00055         c1 = Position.GetX();
00056         c2 = Position.GetY();
00057         c3 = Position.GetZ();
00058         
00059         c1+=m_offset.GetX();
00060         c2+=-m_offset.GetY();
00061         c2=-c2;
00062         
00063         CPoint2D<int> newCell(c3, 1);
00064         str_list<CPoint2D<int> >& c3_list = operator[](c1)[c2];
00065         str_list<CPoint2D<int> >::iterator p = lower_bound(c3_list.begin(), c3_list.end(), newCell);
00066         
00067         if (p->GetX() == c3)
00068         {
00069                 p->AddY(1);
00070                 if (p->GetY() > m_threshold)
00071                 {
00072                         m_peakCoordinates.SetX(c1);
00073                         m_peakCoordinates.SetY(c2);
00074                         m_peakCoordinates.SetZ(c3);
00075                         operator[](c1)[c2] = c3_list;
00076                         return true;
00077                 }
00078         }
00079         else 
00080                 c3_list.insert(p, newCell);
00081         
00082         // operator[](c1)[c2] = c3_list;
00083         return false;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 bool CSparseHoughSpace3D::ParameterCheck(const CPoint3D<int>& Parameter) const
00088 {
00089         int c1 = Parameter.GetX();
00090         int c2 = Parameter.GetY();
00091         int c3 = Parameter.GetZ();
00092         if (m_c1ValueRange.GetX() <= c1 && c1 < m_c1ValueRange.GetY())
00093         {
00094                 if (m_c2ValueRange.GetX() <= c2 && c2 < m_c1ValueRange.GetY())
00095                 {
00096                         if (m_c3ValueRange.GetX() <= c3 && c3 < m_c1ValueRange.GetY())
00097                         {
00098                                 return true;
00099                         }
00100                 }
00101         }
00102         return false;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 void CSparseHoughSpace3D::Alloc()
00107 {
00108         Flush(str_list<CPoint2D<int> >());
00109 }
00110 
00111 void CSparseHoughSpace3D::Alloc(int ImageWidth, int ImageHeight)
00112 {
00113         m_circleQuante = this->ComputeQuantization(ImageWidth, ImageHeight);
00114         CArray2D<str_list<CPoint2D<int> > >::Alloc(m_circleQuante.GetX(), m_circleQuante.GetY());
00115         Alloc();
00116 }

00129 
00130 
00131 void CSparseHoughSpace3D::SetThreshold(int Threshold)
00132 {
00133         m_threshold = Threshold;
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00138 // Private methods
00140 
00141 
00142 CPoint3D<int> CSparseHoughSpace3D::ComputeQuantization(int ImageWidth, int ImageHeight)
00143 {
00144         int c1 = ImageWidth;
00145         int c2 = ImageHeight;
00146         int c3 = (int) sqrt(c1*c1+c2*c2);
00147         
00148         m_c1ValueRange.SetX(-c1/2);
00149         m_c1ValueRange.SetY(c1/2);
00150         m_c2ValueRange.SetX(-c2/2);
00151         m_c2ValueRange.SetY(c2/2);
00152         m_c3ValueRange.SetX(0);
00153         m_c3ValueRange.SetY(c3);
00154         
00155         m_offset.SetX(c1/2);
00156         m_offset.SetY(c2/2);
00157         
00158         return CPoint3D<int>(c1,c2,c3);
00159 }
00160 
00161 } // end namespace ipl
